title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to integrate with my health-monitoring devices so that I can keep track of my health conditions without feeling like I'm being monitored.

title: Medication Reminder Support
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medications so that I can maintain my health without feeling monitored.

title: Emergency Alert System
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide an emergency alert system so that I can feel safe and supported without feeling monitored.

title: Personalized Health Insights
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to provide personalized health insights based on my activity and health data so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and stay on top of my health without feeling monitored.

title: Caregiver Access to Health Data
summary: As an older adult, I want my caregivers to access my health data when necessary so that I can receive timely support without feeling monitored.

title: Daily Health Reminders
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to send me daily health reminders so that I can manage my appointments and medication without feeling monitored or overwhelmed.

title: Health History Tracking
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to track my health history and provide easy access to this information so that I can stay informed about my well-being without feeling monitored.

title: Health Goal Setting and Tracking
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to set and track my health goals so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities and stay on top of my health without feeling monitored.
